text.p: What is the maximum number of pivots in a [mathjaxinline]6\times 3[/mathjaxinline] coefficient matrix, when row-reduced?

font.p: There aren't any non-zero entries above or below a pivot. Thus, there is at most one pivot in each column. Thus there can be no more than 3 pivots. There are enough rows that this is possible to attain.
